div: Turning in Project 5/Task 0: Please create a Project5a directory under turnin (in SVN), with the diagram in Memos/Project5 as normal. Add text files there, if needed. Use ASCII or PDF for the diagram. Richard has no obligation to grade any other format. So, if you plan on using a drawing tool, including a UML tool (no need to do so!), make sure it can export PDF.
